messages.content: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about you?
That's awesome! I bet you're ready to relax now ðŸ˜Š
What have you been up to?
Just been thinking about you! How was your day?
Better now that I'm talking to you
Aww you're so sweet! Tell me more about your day
I miss you too! I'm always here when you want to talk
You make ME happy! What do you want to talk about?
